alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of strong storms will impact portions of central Juab... southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 610 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southwest of Elberta, or 18 miles west of Nephi, moving east at 55 mph. Strong crosswinds are possible along I-15 and may make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Payson, Nephi, Dugway English Village, Lehi, Eagle Mountain, Santaquin, Rocky Ridge, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Tooele Army Depot South, Spring Lake, Utah Lake, West Mountain, Elberta, Benjamin, Lake Shore, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Saratoga Springs, Mona and Genola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 213 and 249. US Route 6 between mile markers 108 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
